ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes. This is the bread and butter of any student interested in micro theory.

I definitely would recommend it to anyone interested in doing research in Micro Theory. Otherwise, I think that the course does not make too much sense as the students would probably not have the necessary interest to keep up with the coursework.
Beware of the final and read MWG chapter 23 and Chapter 6 of Myerson's book for Prof. Gerardi's part. Read as many papers as you can for prof Watson's part.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It helped me better understand mechanism design and communication. In fact, Prof. Watson's portion really got me interested in contract theory and law and econ.
